about_the_game:
A secret Sengoku Era drama begins now.

"Touken Ranbu Warriors" is an action game that is a collaboration between the "spirits of blades" simulation game "Touken Ranbu ONLINE" presented by DMM GAMES and NITRO PLUS, and the thrilling "1 vs. 1,000" WARRIORS series of KOEI TECMO GAMES.

●"Touken Ranbu" is in 3D at last. Witness the most beautiful graphics in the history of the WARRIORS series.
The Touken Danshi characters, which will be familiar to fans of the source material, rush about the battlefield in 3D.
In addition to the thrilling action you expect from the WARRIORS series, you can enjoy battles with a plentiful variety of animations, such as battling together with a partner and dueling.
Experience battles with the Touken Danshi that are both fierce and beautiful.

●Fifteen blades incarnate from a drifting honmaru base set out on a historical drama in the Sengoku Era. Experience an original epic story that can only be found in this game.

Story overview:
The Touken Danshi, 15 blades incarnate who had been drifting aimlessly without a Saniwa master, are suddenly attacked by the History Retrograde Army.
After the battle, they are assigned by the Government of the Time to undertake "onslaught investigations."
The masterless blades have no choice but to depart for the chaotic world of the Sengoku Era, whose history had already begun to be altered.

●The honmaru serves as the base of the Touken Danshi. Enjoy tons of special events and elements that can only be found in this title.
The Touken Danshi can be placed freely within the 3D-depicted honmaru, the characters' base where they live.
Players can also see how the Touken Danshi are doing at the honmaru, as well as view original events unique to this title in which they interact with one another.
Between battles, players can take a break and enjoy mini-games such as "Pose Matching" and "Tag."
Photo Mode, in which players can take pictures of the Touken Danshi , is also included.

●Easy Mode has been included, so even players who are less proficient at action games can control the game easily.
Two types of controls are included: "Regular Mode," which features the control scheme traditionally used for the WARRIORS series, and "Easy Mode," which uses controls for players less proficient at action games.
The latter only requires simple button inputs, so players will be able to enjoy the beautiful actions.
detailed_description:
Touken Ranbu Warriors Digital Deluxe Edition

The "Touken Ranbu Warriors Digital Deluxe Edition" is a discount set that includes the main game, as well as the content below. - Content included in Digital Deluxe Edition 5 Honmaru Backdrops (*1) / 5 Additional Music Pieces (*2, *3) / 16 Uchiban Outfits (*4, *5, *6) *1: Under certain conditions, changes made to your honmaru backdrop will not be applied. *2: The additional music includes 3 battle music pieces, and 2 honmaru music pieces. You can listen to additional music by selecting "Memoirs" - "Music Album" from Honmaru. *3: "Change Honmaru Music" can be used after clearing the game. *4: Uchiban Outfits are variations of outfits from the source material "Touken Ranbu ONLINE" that can be worn into battle. *5: Uchiban Outfits can only be worn at the honmaru or during a "Replay" battle. They cannot be worn for a "Sortie" battle. *6: Characters wearing Uchiban Outfits will not be in an Injured State. While wearing the outfits, the Hissatsu Gauge will fill more easily. Notes: "Touken Ranbu Warriors" is also available. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase. Each of the DLC items included in this content is the same as the respective item available for individual purchase. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase. When update data from the latest version is required, please update your game before use.


Honmaru Backdrop 5-piece Set

A set that allows you to obtain at a discount all 5 varieties of Honmaru Backdrop options. Content: - Honmaru Backdrop "Sakura Viewing" - Honmaru Backdrop "Sakura Viewing - Nighttime" - Honmaru Backdrop "Rainy Season" - Honmaru Backdrop "Autumn Leaves" - Honmaru Backdrop "Snow Viewing" How to use: Select "Settings" - "DLC Settings" - "Change Backdrop" from Honmaru. Notes: Under certain conditions, changes made to your honmaru backdrop will not be applied. There is also a product that includes this content. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase. Each of the DLC items included in this content is the same as the respective item available for individual purchase. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase. To use the content, "Touken Ranbu Warriors", which is sold separately, is required. Also, when update data from the latest version is required, please update your game before use.


Additional Music 5-piece Set

Arrangements of pieces from the source material "Touken Ranbu ONLINE". A set that allows you to obtain at a discount all 5 additional music pieces. Content: - Additional Music "Battle - Touken Ranbu Warriors" - Additional Music "Memories of Aonohara - Touken Ranbu Warriors" - Additional Music "Osaka Winter Campaign - Touken Ranbu Warriors" - Additional Music "Honmaru - Touken Ranbu Warriors" - Additional Music "Uchiban - Touken Ranbu Warriors" How to use: Battle Music: Can be changed by selecting "Replay" from Honmaru, and then selecting "Change Battle Music" from Battle Preparations. Honmaru Music: Can be changed by selecting "Settings" - "Change Honmaru Music" from Honmaru. Notes: "Change Honmaru Music" can be used after clearing the game. You can listen to additional music by selecting "Memoirs" - "Music Album" from Honmaru. There is also a product that includes this content. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase. Each of the DLC items included in this content is the same as the respective item available for individual purchase. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase. To use the content, "Touken Ranbu Warriors", which is sold separately, is required. Also, when update data from the latest version is required, please update your game before use.


Uchiban Outfit 16-piece Set

Uchiban Outfits are variations of outfits from the source material "Touken Ranbu ONLINE" that can be worn into battle. A set that allows you to obtain at a discount all 16 varieties of Uchiban Outfits. Content: - Uchiban Outfit "Mikazuki Munechika" - Uchiban Outfit "Sengo Muramasa" - Uchiban Outfit "Tonbokiri" - Uchiban Outfit "Kasen Kanesada" - Uchiban Outfit "Ichigo Hitofuri" - Uchiban Outfit "Namazuo Toushiro" - Uchiban Outfit "Hyuga Masamune" - Uchiban Outfit "Heshikiri Hasebe" - Uchiban Outfit "Yagen Toushiro" - Uchiban Outfit "Tomoegata Naginata" - Uchiban Outfit "Tsurumaru Kuninaga" - Uchiban Outfit "Shokudaikiri Mitsutada" - Uchiban Outfit "Okurikara" - Uchiban Outfit "Yamanbagiri Kunihiro" - Uchiban Outfit "Yamanbagiri Chougi" - Uchiban Outfit "Omokage" How to use: Select the outfits from "Settings" - "DLC Settings" - "Change Outfits" from Honmaru. Notes: Uchiban Outfits can only be worn at the honmaru or during a "Replay" battle. They cannot be worn for a "Sortie" battle. Characters wearing Uchiban Outfits will not be in an Injured State. While wearing the outfits, the Hissatsu Gauge will fill more easily. There is also a product that includes this content. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase. Each of the DLC items included in this content is the same as the respective item available for individual purchase. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase. To use the content, "Touken Ranbu Warriors", which is sold separately, is required. Also, when update data from the latest version is required, please update your game before use.

A secret Sengoku Era drama begins now. name: Touken Ranbu Warriors

subs.option_text: Touken Ranbu Warriors Digital Deluxe Edition - $109.99 USD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played & DirectX 9.0c or above
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 16 bit stereo, 48KHz WAVE file can be played & DirectX 9.0c or above
